Token.Abstract: Developers can import RMInteractiveSource in order to enable embedded interactivity in their RMMapView, RMMBTilesSource, and RMMapBoxSource objects. Interactivity is based on the UTFGrid specification, which is a space-efficient way to encode many arbitrary values for pixel coordinates at every zoom level, allowing later retrieval based on user events on those coordinates. For example, the user touching a pixel in Spain could trigger retrieval of Spain's flag image for display.
Returns YES if a map view supports interactivity features given its current tile sources.
Returns the HTML-formatted output for a given point on a given map view.

Parameter.Name: outputType
Parameter.Abstract: The type of feature info desired.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: A point in the map view.
